title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6659.6 - Reimbursement formula
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6659.6 - Reimbursement formula

State Regulations

Within the limits of annual appropriations, a municipality
shall receive State aid equal to half its approved expenditures, but not more
than the amounts set forth in section 543 of the Executive Law according to the
latest census data which shall be certified in the same manner as provided by
section
54
of the

State Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6659.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
